name: Gangster Vegas Crime
description:
Enter the city of crime, auto theft, gangsters and sin, in this exciting free open world mafia game that takes to the streets of top crimes Vegas Gangster's city and its dangerous deadly criminals, gangster crimes and crime mafia in this secret city of vice. Your drive & steal cars, shoot up rival gang members, and explore the city crime

Features:
• Many powerful weapons to unlock
• Addictive crime games environment
• Easy to play and hard to become kingpin
• Smooth and easy gangstar game controls
• Amazing shooting and killing animation
